data.text:
This is a great hotel. Location, staff, cleaness.

We stayed 4 nights, room only, never tried the food but heard it was good. Had a few drinks at the bar and they were hood. Rooftop area is really nice. 

Bar garden nice spot to sit and relax. Location us pretty central. Walking distance to most places, outside of that, taxi or metro. 

All in all 100% we would stay here again. We had a balcony front facing room. Suited us perfectly.
data.title: Great hotel.

data.text: The hotel was very easy to find from the airport bus drop off. The entrance/reception is stunning and smelt lovely. The reception staff were friendly and we were allowed to leave our bags until check in time. The room on the 5th floor was spacious and well equipped. The beds were very comfortable. Only couple of minor criticisms - despite setting the air con, it kicked in and was very cold meaning I had to turn it off which then meant the room was too warm. It could also have done with a hoover as could see bits of dust in the corners.
data.title: Family trip with teenage daughter

data.text: Arrived back home yesterday after a 4 night break in Barcelona  with my husband. The trip was for our 40th wedding anniversary and on booking didnt realise just how perfect this hotel would be for us . The location is ideal for exploring the city as a lot of the main attractions are within walking distance and if you want to use public transport there are bus stops and a metro station right outside the front door . The hotel is lovely inside and is well maintained with a bar which has a courtyard outside which is a very relaxing area to sit in and surprisingly quiet as the hotel is on a busy square , there is also a rooftop terrace with a plunge pool with sunloungers and another bar  .The restaurant is clean and bright and the breakfast is buffet style with plenty to choose from and friendly helpful staff . Our room was overlooking the square but had great soundproofing so traffic noise was not a problem and the facillities were spot on (large comfy bed , bathobe and slippers , coffee machine with complimentary pods and also a bootle of water per guest provided daily ) , even the toiletries provided are a quality brand could'nt fault it . We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and would definitely come back to this hotel and recommend it to anyone visiting Barcelona .
data.title: Perfect.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear L2718FGjd,

We would like to thank you for sharing such a detailed comment about your experience with us.

We are glad to read that you recognize our daily effort to meet our guests' expectations. We hope we will welcome you the next time you visit Barcelona.

Kind regards,
owner_response.author: Cial Urquinaona

data.text: Had a wonderful stay in Barcelona at the h10.   From the moment we arrived the staff were helpful and attentive.   Room was comfortable and exceptionally clean.  Bed was comfortable and there is a pillow menu if you have specific requirements. Temp control in room was best ever had in a hotel room.   Hotel itself is lovely, perfectly located for all Barcelonas sites and definitely one I would return to.  Wide choice of food for breakfast and each day slightly different.   Definitely would not disappoint for anyone wanting to explore this fabulous city.
data.title: Not one to be missed.    All round great hotel in fantastic location.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Charlotte E,

We would like to thank you for sharing such an amazing feedback! Reviews like yours encourage us to keep improving every day.

We look forward to welcoming you the next time you visit Barcelona.

Kind regards,
owner_response.author: Cial Urquinaona

data.text: A fantastic stay. Really good central location and well connected to public transport, for instance the airport bus is a short walk away. Stunning welcome from excellent friendly staff with a drink and assistance in carrying luggage to the room. Great facilities in the room with coffee, tv, slippers, toothbrush and toothpaste to name a few. The beds are super comfy too. We had a nice view of the square in front. The bar is excellent with a lovely outdoor area and the staff in here were great. Overall a great experience and super friendly
data.title: Outstanding

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you for sharing such a detailed feedback of your stay. Our staff is delighted to know that our guests value our daily effort to meet your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you the next time you visit Barcelona. 
Best regards,
owner_response.author: Cial Urquinaona
